profile.name: srrrse
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | Rust Enthusiast | Systems Programming Expert
profile.summary: Highly motivated software engineer with a passion for systems programming and concurrency. Proficient in Rust, with expertise in async programming, parser generation, and concurrent data structures.
profile.company: Based on the provided information, I would recommend 'Dokkio' as a potential employer for

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer at Dokkio
description: Designed and implemented high-performance systems using Rust's unique features, such as garbage collection with shifgrethor and exception handling without fehler.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to develop scalable and concurrent data structures using dashmap.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed multiple open-source projects, including a parser generator using lalrpop and concurrent data structures with dashmap.
Worked on various freelance projects, honing skills in async programming with async-std and async-h1.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Maintained multiple open-source repositories, including a Rust project that explored zero-cost futures and streams with futures-rs.
Contributed to the development of various libraries and frameworks, improving their performance and scalability.

Concurrency Models: Async programming with async-std and async-h1
